lead_paragraph: The American-born cleric Anwar al-Awlaki said he had “communications” with the Nigerian suspect in the Dec. 25 airliner bomb plot in Yemen last fall, according to a Yemeni journalist.
snippet: The American-born cleric Anwar al-Awlaki said he had “communications” with the Nigerian suspect in the Dec. 25 airliner bomb plot in Yemen last fall, according to a Yemeni journalist.

headline.main: Cleric in Yemen Admits Meeting Airliner Plot Suspect, Journalist Says
headline.print_headline: Cleric in Yemen Admits Meeting Airliner Plot Suspect, Journalist Says
